body:
To get an update on your claim or wish to progress it, [sign in to the 'Money claims' service](https://www.moneyclaims.service.gov.uk) using your email address and the password you created when you created your account.

If you've forgotten your password, you can [request a new password](https://hmcts-access.service.gov.uk/reset/forgotpassword).
heading: Get an update on a money claim
